title: (24400) Ponferrada - 7 Avenida Gran Vía Reino de León
title_short: (24400) Ponferrada - 7 Avenida Gran Vía Reino de León
description: Large parking lot next to a park and the library. near the center.

address.street: 7 Avenida Gran Vía Reino de León

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 23 Calle San Valerio
description: Lacolada Ponferrada Self-Service Laundry. They open every day from 8:30 to 22:00. Clothes washing and drying services. 5 minutes from the motorhome area and the San Nicolas hostel. Highly recommended if you are passing through.

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 25T Calle Señor de Arganza
description:
Motorhome Area at Shell Gas Station with parking and NO surveillance (surveillance is for the gas station car washes), very well located to visit and spend a few days in the city, although next to the train tracks.
The train does not run at night.
It has a large Coviran supermarket, and a cafeteria bar. fantastic showers. They leave you a towel and soap, and even a hairdryer

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 8 Plaza Poblado de Compostilla
description: Parking in the area of the museum of light to visit Ponferrada

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 2 Calle Obispo Camilo Lorenzo
description: Parking tolerated for one night in front of the pilgrims' inn on the way to Saint Jacques de Compostela

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 7 Plaza Poblado de Compostilla
description: Parking for visitors to the museum "the light factory". It is spacious for our motorhomes. I recommend this interesting visit.

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 8 Travesía Camino Jacobeo
description: Quiet parking to visit the castle  and rest. Next to the center, bars, restaurants, shops, etc.

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 36 Calle Buenavista
description: Free parking near the Templar castle, nice mountain views

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 1C Avenida de la Libertad
description: Parking under free trees. Large, near the El Rosal shopping center. During the week of shows, between 5 and 15 September it becomes a little noisy, the rest of the year is very quiet.

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 14 Calle V Avenida
description: Quiet and flat location on the edge of a small park and the Way of Saint James. Perfect for an overnight stay, but far from the city center.

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 3 Avenida de los Escritores
description: Parking very close from the Centre to visit the city. Free.

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 5 Calle Antonio González Calderón
description: Parking very close to a shopping center. Perfectly level in places, next to a grassy esplanade. Room to spare, quiet (although cars pass).

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 21 Avenida de Portugal
description: Laundry open every day of the year from 8:30 to 9:30 (hours by curfew). Last wash or dry at 20:55

title: (24400) Ponferrada - 98 Avenida Galicia
description: Lavanderia self-service

title: (24398) Congosto - 380 A-6
description: Service area where you can take a hot shower at its facilities

title: (24413) Molinaseca - 12 Travesía Manuel Fraga
description: Alternative parking to the Molina seca area. some noise from the road and pilgrims leaving early. otherwise well 1km from the town center with free access soccer field and tennis court.

title: (24414) Ponferrada - 46 Calle San Juan
description: Parking next to a church, very quiet, space to spare and incredible sunset.

title: (24415) San Esteban de Valdueza - 31 Calle Conde
title_short: (24415) San Esteban de Valdueza - 31 Calle Conde
description: Nice and quiet place to spend the night in the valley of silence. Next to a hotel-bar-restaurant, has a fountain and a football field and a basketball court.

title: (24416) Congosto - Unnamed Road
description: Heavenly

title: (24413) Molinaseca - 10 Calle Salgueras
description: Nice parking lot in Molinaseca, with gray water and water intake. also garbage. The excursion to the bridges and a bath in the natural pools are highly recommended.

title: (24398) San Miguel de Las Dueñas -
description: Parking next to the Cistercian monastery of San Miguel De Las Dueñas, flat and quiet, it has three bars nearby, in one of them you have lunch or dinner, two shops, a pharmacy, you can park there to go to the path of the stonecutters, A very nice environment. There is a children's park just opposite. And everything is very well lit. It is very quiet.

title: (24410) Camponaraya - 9 Calle Valiña
description: Infatil park in the middle of town but with the possibility of parking. To eat in the motorhome or in the benches (without table) and that the children can play later. Without services Water fountain in the same park and bakery / cafeteria opposite.

title: (24398) Congosto - Avenida de Posada del Río
title_short: (24398) Congosto - Avenida de Posada del Río
description: Quiet and beautiful place to spend a night (and the day) quietly. The Bárcena Reservoir is a 5 'walk away. About three vans fit. When we came we were alone and it was great!

title: (24410) Camponaraya - 63 Avenida Francisco Sobrín
description: Laundry. Self-service with 3 washing machines 2x12KG, 1 of 16KG. And 2 dryers 18KG. Automatic currency exchange and hours from 8:00 to 23:00. Ample parking next door and good bars and restaurants nearby.

title: (24398) Almazcara -
description: Almazcara municipal swimming pools. Level parking right next to the pools. Good place to spend a day with the family, have a drink or take a shower (paying admission) Adult €1.20 Children €0.80. At the pool bar there are sandwiches, pizzas and cold drinks. Hours from 11:30 to 21:00. Bathing cap necessary.

title: (24390) Ponferrada - 85 Calle S.N.11 Dehesas
description: Large and quiet parking. On some dates of the year it is where they carry out the festivities of the Town, the rest of the days totally empty and quiet.

title: (24492) Cubillos del Sil - Calle el Carrerón
title_short: (24492) Cubillos del Sil - Calle el Carrerón
description: Ample parking and flat with trees and 50 meters from the swamp of Barcena, it is a quiet place in the middle of nature. Before it was not possible to go from cubillos by the height but now yes.

title: (24412) - 95 Lugar Poligono Industrial
description: Motorhome area in the Karting circuit, there are bungalows, there are all services and if there is no water, those of the karting are asked, there is a grill for lunch or dinner and more.

title: (24492) Cubillos del Sil - 9 Avenida Pabellon de Deportes
title_short: (24492) Cubillos del Sil - 9 Avenida Pabellon de Deportes
description: Free parking next to the Cubillos del Sil sports hall. Very quiet to spend the night, eat, rest, stroll through this beautiful town. Bars, supermarket, banks etc

title: (24398) Congosto - Calle el Pantano
description: Small recreational area, difficult leveling, no services, 4G, bath in reservoir, shade, very quiet.

title: (24398) Congosto - 18 Avenida El Campo
description: Quiet area next to a football field and stone tables two minutes from the Barcena peat bog and great views. Village with bar and restaurant.

title: (24398) Congosto - 6 Calle el Ayuntamiento
description: Nice picnic place

title: (24398) Toreno - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful site in the Ermita de la Peña, ideal for a quiet place to spend the night. There is no water. Picnic tables in the shade.

title: (24492) Cubillinos - 10 Calle Real
description: Cubillinos service area. Very small, quiet and charming town. Near the motorway from Ponferrada to Villablino.

title: (24390) Carracedelo - Calle Río Sil
description: Lugar increíble en plena naturaleza on un puente colgante. Se puede bañar. Silencio absoluto. Por favor lleven su basura.

title: (24443) San Juan de Paluezas - 5A Lugar S Juan Paluezas
title_short: (24443) San Juan de Paluezas - 5A Lugar S Juan Paluezas
description: Flat and very wide esplanade at the top of the town where you can sleep very calmly. You can cross the town and arrive with a large motorhome. You can also go down the track next to the cemetery (4km) which, although it is quite steep, is in perfect condition and ends at the suspension bridge, where there are also several places to spend the night by the river. (1 or 2 vehicles only)

title: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 Travesía Peña
title_short: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 Travesía Peña
description: Wide almost flat area. Good panoramic to the west. Near a great hostel. Everyone sleeps soon.

title: (24549) Carracedelo - 7T Calle la Iglesia
description: Parking next to the Pools of Carracedelo (Leon). They are ideal pools to spend the day with children. It has a restaurant inside the pool.

title: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 LE-142
title_short: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 LE-142
description: Entering the dirt road on the left there is grass after the playground. We slept one night there with good views of the sunset and the town very quiet. In the town there are two or three hostels that offer bar service, we ate in one.

title: (24446) Paradela de Muces - 24A Lugar Paradela Muces
title_short: (24446) Paradela de Muces - 24A Lugar Paradela Muces
description: Traffic-free parking in a small town, breathtaking views near Cornatel Castle, there are several small benches and garbage containers

title: (24540) Cacabelos - 1 Plaza el Santuario
description: Good beach on the banks of the Cúa, quiet for eating, resting, swimming, etc. single car park without services

title: (24540) Cacabelos - 3 Plaza el Santuario
description: Two parking areas, one next to the river beach, without shade or services; the other 20 meters away, behind a modern fair building. In this second area there are shadows, you can spend the night quietly and there is a black and gray emptying point. The pot filler tap is loose but works. The area is easily accessible. The town has all kinds of services and, except during festivals or fairs, it is quiet.

name: Camping El Bierzo
title: (24550) Camping El Bierzo
description: Camping "El Bierzo" Quiet campsite near the river and also near the town (you can go walking). Level and wooded land. Restaurant service. Dogs are not allowed

title: (24565) Carracedelo - 68A Calle La Leira
description: Parking next to the local office and a park. Quiet to spend the night with lighting. The town of Villadepalos very close walking with a bakery supermarket etc ... hiking and mtb routes that leave from the same parking lot.

title: (24414) Ponferrada - Unnamed Road
description: La Herrería de Compludo car park. Close to very little traveled road. Very quiet, you can visit the smithy.

title: (24444) La Chana - 1A Calle la Curralada
description: Fresh water spring in use by the locals.

title: (24444) La Chana - 3A Calle la Curralada
description: The lovely little village of La Chana. Large parking spot beside the Church and one smaller one next to the spring not in use. The church parking lot slopes, but is flatter by the church. Next to the disused spring there is space for one small camper on a flat area under a tree. Only suitable for smaller campers due to narrow roads. Transit Custom no problems. There is a drinking water spring just down the road on the left.

title: (24318) San Román de Bembibre -
description: Drinking water Space for 1 camper

title: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago -
description: Very nice location, parking provided by the village. 3 car parks follow one another, plenty of choice. Anyway, access to the village is forbidden to all vehicles ... Very quiet, breathtaking view.

title: (24318) - Unnamed Road
description: We have only stopped to drink but there are many trucks and some van. Hostel with bathrooms and showers (paid service). It looks good to be a good place to spend the night.

name: La Siesta Fresh Food
title: (24459) La Siesta Fresh Food
description:
At La Siesta Food Truck we are lovers of Caravaning. We offer the possibility of spending one night FREE of charge to all those who enjoy our menu.
It is NOT allowed to put awnings or tables in the facilities and we do not have electricity either.
Site surrounded by forests, hiking trails and river beaches just 15 km from Ponferrada.

title: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago - 2 Calle Real Paseo
title_short: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago - 2 Calle Real Paseo
description: Peñalba de Santiago, splendid place for hiking and enjoy one of the most beautiful villages in Spain. Very cautious with the access, the vans will not have any problem but the motorhomes because of the access of the paved road do not pass in width nor in height, it is necessary to take the route of forest track, road about 8km without asphalt, but we arrive safely, Attention: always in dry weather, it does not pass in case of rain or snow. We can sleep without problem.

title: (24443) Carucedo - Unnamed Road
description: Place at the edge of a dam lake. Be careful not to park too close to the water, because the level rises every evening via pumping !! . Van access possible, no motorhome.

title: (24318) Bembibre - 4 Calle los Alores
description: Perfect parking to rest. Quiet site. Very close to the A-6 and N-6 road with a good bar and cheap restaurants one at the end of the beautiful street. Playground. Very shady Water sources. Next to the medical center. perfect for a rest or a quiet night.

title: (24493) Toreno - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and very spacious place. You can park in various areas. It is in the middle of nature, there is no service. Ideal for those looking for tranquility. It is reached by dirt road with quite a bump. Attention. Not recommended in rain !!!

title: (24548) Cacabelos - 7 Calle Pico Vila
description: Picnic area near the river, very quiet. Some locals pass but all good. Point of rest or overnight, and to visit the surroundings and the adjoining mountains. Please pick up the trash even if it's not yours!

title: (24414) Carracedo de Compludo - 4 Calle Iglesia
description: Parking area at the entrance of the town. Very quiet place. No services.

title: (24569) Toral de los Vados - 18 Calle el Carralcobo
title_short: (24569) Toral de los Vados - 18 Calle el Carralcobo
description: Grass esplanade marked as parking. With some shade. No services Good alternative to P de AC. Next to a little traveled road. Great for a night. Close to the town and the river where you can do routes and bathe.

title: (24560) Toral de los Vados - 15 Calle las Matas
title_short: (24560) Toral de los Vados - 15 Calle las Matas
description: Great area, during the summer there are musical performances until 11 or so. But they don't bother much. Too bad that pets are not allowed. Otherwise perfect. Pets have to be leashed. This area has the support of the Castellana y Leonesa de Autocaravanistas, a representative association of motorhomes in Castilla y León. Only motorhomes.

title: (24300) Bembibre - 43 Calle Eloy Reigada
description: Self-service laundry open 365 days, from 8:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

title: (24569) Penedelo - 3 Calle el Río
description: They have recently rehabilitated the area. And all the fords. Parking next to the river promenade. It has an evacuation of black water and a tap of water. No noise and very quiet area.

title: (24442) Carucedo - CV-191-2
description: Parking behind the Roman Domus, on the road from Carucedo to Las Médulas on the right. It doesn't have views as cool as the archaeological class above, but it is less airy and as calm and flat

title: () Toral de los Vados - Carretera de Logroño
title_short: () Toral de los Vados - Carretera de Logroño
description: Artificial beach of river water. With access to the river too. Parking to one side with shade and wider to the front, but without shade. This is a car park so there are no services.

title: (24442) Carucedo - C. Cementerio
description: Very large car park in the Carucedo cemetery. I spent a super quiet night and watching the stars. There is no service of any kind.

title: (24444) Orellán - 25A Lugar Orellan
description: Beautiful place to spend the night in the town of Orellan, the last parking lot to go up to the viewpoint for vehicles over 6 meters. Peaceful place

title: (24444) Borrenes - Unnamed Road
description: Parking from Orellana's point of view.

title: (24442) Carucedo - 27A Calle Carretera
description: Small parking lot behind La Casa del Parque. Useful for dog walkers circling the lake. Very calm. Ideal for our 2 dogs! 6 places approximately. Near the lake, but yes. overlooking him. the car park is dirt and is not marked as such. But we were with 4 other mobile homes and there was no problem. The only negative is that it has night lighting so they must wear good light. The parking closest to this place if they specify that caravans are prohibited

title: (24442) Carucedo -
description: Superb shaded area by the lake. Qq young fishermen or less in the evening or in the morning but very nice. Space for several vans, but we were alone there (1 or 2 other smaller spots in the path just before). To get there, take the path to the right 50m down from the dam (in the direction of Carucedo and not the other way around). Hairpin bend at the bottom of the path, small swamp to follow, then continue to the end along the lake. In my opinion impossible in CC. Possible to fish on the spot for those who like.

title: (24442) Carucedo - 1A Calle Carretera
description: Parking next to the road without services but good to spend a night, we have several AC and we slept without problem

title: (24300) Bembibre - 4 Avenida Manuel Arroyo Quiñónez
description: Parking of an institute of land and well leveled. One step away from the municipal swimming pools, the heated ones, pavilion and a playground. A five minute walk from the center of Bembibre and very close to the exit of the national highway. Recommended for a quiet night

title: (24442) Carucedo - 4A Calle Carretera
description: Quiet area with bar in nearby village. Easy access to picnic tables and river beach. Water fountain opposite the entrance to the museum. There's parking available in two car parks, one either side of the museum. WC in the picnic area, open during summer.

title: (24389) Pombriego - 5A Calle Palacio
description: Parking without services, quiet place next to the church. You can go around with a van or AC.

title: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago -
description: Abandoned ski resort on the mountain peak! Lovely views and a great night sky, we slept one night with no problems.

title: (24440) Lago de Carucedo - 29A Calle Iglesia
description: Lago de Carrucedo, access by a small narrow road. Quiet place to park and sleep there one night. No service, but a small beach away from the main beach which is worth the detour! You have to walk a bit to find it.

title: (24450) Toreno - CL-631
description: Parking next to the football field ideal to stop for lunch or rest, with shade, tables and barbecues. We have not stayed overnight but it seems a pretty quiet place.

title: (24300) Bembibre - Paseo de la Devesa
description: Stadium parking. Wide and a little sloping. There are no services. Good shade in summer. We stopped to rest a while and you couldn't hear the road.

title: (24440) Lago de Carucedo - 29A Calle Iglesia
description:
Another little spot around this lake. No direct lake access here.  
Water available in the village. 

✔ shade
✔ quiet
✔ pretty flat

❌ no services 
❌ very muddy after rain, beware

title: (24442) Carucedo -
description: Place in front of the lake, ideal to spend the night. You must enter a path with tall grass but in perfect condition.

title: (24440) Lago de Carucedo - 10A Calle Cuesta
description: Nice place to rest, and also for the night. No service, overlooking the lake.

title: (24440) Lago de Carucedo - 29A Calle Iglesia
description: Small parking at the foot of the church.

title: (24440) Carucedo - 12 Calle Da Calella
description:
Take the path lined with poplars that reaches the edge of the Lake, shaded place. Without convenience, alone in the world.
Ideal for van. 
Attention, can be wet in the winter. 

Beautiful location, in the middle of the huge trunks trees and flat to sleep.

title: (24442) Carucedo - CV-191-2
description: Cemetery car park, very wide a little steep at the beginning but almost flat next to the cemetery, the entire surface is gravel. 2 min walk from the town where there are bars restaurants. Perfect for hiking.

title: (24442) Carucedo - CV-191-2
description: Parking at the entrance of Las Médulas. Ideal for visiting the Roman mines. It has an area with a sign prohibiting motorhomes and caravans, but on the right hand side there is a detour in which you came a parked and without a prohibited sign. It has hours, closes at night.

title: (24317) Torre del Bierzo - 4A Calle Huerta Nueva
title_short: (24317) Torre del Bierzo - 4A Calle Huerta Nueva
description: Parking of the old mine, flat, pleasant place, but without any service.

title: (24516) Horta - LE-5220
description: A picnic area with a source of untreated water, it has tables, a barbecue, it has an area to park, although it is small, and across the road there is a viewpoint with incredible views.

name: Camping El Lago, COMPLEJO HOSTELERO DE VILELA
title: (24516) Camping El Lago, COMPLEJO HOSTELERO DE VILELA
title_short: (24516) Camping El Lago, COMPLEJO HOSTELERO DE VILELA
description: Camping, pitches marked out by hedges, large camping areas, fishing lake (possibility of cooking trout) Restaurant menu and daily menu, bar service, shop with basic products.

title: (24378) Torre del Bierzo - LE-5321
description: Nice town with a river beach, Wi-Fi internet connection, hiking trails, parking suitable for motorhomes with the possibility of drinking water with a normal tap, unlimited overnight stays, a very good Bar-Restaurant. You cannot access the town with tourism. The town's water source is great.

title: (24378) San Facundo - LE-5321
description: Nice town to visit, quiet place with a restaurant bar and a Flubial beach, there are several routes to do. You have to ask for permission to the number that appears in the photo to check availability. It even has a covered picnic area with a barbecue.

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 1A Calle Cotelo
description: Parking area with easy access to visit Villafranca, 5 minutes from the center.

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 2 Calle el Penedelo
title_short: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 2 Calle el Penedelo
description: Good place to visit the village

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 28 Calle Fuente Cubelo
title_short: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 28 Calle Fuente Cubelo
description: Nine places marked for motorhomes, services already available. Drain for gray and black water. Nice town on the Camino de Santiago. Supermarket very close. Walk along the river and urban center 5 minutes away.

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 43 Calle la Granja
title_short: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 43 Calle la Granja
description: A good parking lot to spend the night in Villafranca del Bierzo. Located next to the fluvial beach and with some place to park in the shade. The visit to the town, which is a place of passage on the Camino de Santiago, is worth it.

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 5 Calle Principal de Campo
title_short: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 5 Calle Principal de Campo
description: Square with parking spaces that allow for medium sized motorhomes. Some shady sites. Next to the river and near the river beach, something farther away. The center very close. Without services.

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 1 Calle Vivero
description: Ideal parking to visit the town, the center at 500m. The entrance to the town is complicated, especially the other parking lot that the GPS put us through the river and we had to retreat 100m.

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 43 Calle el Salvador
title_short: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 43 Calle el Salvador
description: We read that it was difficult to enter the city with a motorhome and it seemed like a good option on the outskirts. Along the road. Only during the day. About a 15-minute walk from the Roman Bridge and Calle del Agua

title: (24500) Villafranca del Bierzo - 6A Carretera Corullón
description: Small quiet place for 2 vans. Flat and quiet next to the hermitage. AC is not recommended because there is a short fig tree at the beginning of the path that makes access difficult

title: (24430) Vega de Espinareda - Calle Pandetrave
description: Large parking without services without asphalt but very quiet, next to the monastery of the city 10 minutes walk

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - LE-142
description: Parking, gravel on a meadow, garbage cans and picnic tables available.

title: (24319) Bembibre - 32 Calle Cristo Labaniegos
description: Parking area in a beautiful green area of the wonderful town of Labanego. Perfect for campers. Next door you have a bar-terrace La Casa Mágica.

title: (24430) Vega de Espinareda - LE-5202
description: Picnic area covered with shade for our vehicle. Along the road. Of all the Park4nights out there, this one is worth it for being in a low elevation and not being surrounded by clouds.

name: Camping Rivera del Cua
title: (24430) Camping Rivera del Cua
description:
Camping very quiet and very well priced. Very good deal. I recommend it. everything very clean.
On its website all the prices of accommodation and food appear in addition to being exposed to the public in the reception area.

title: (24430) Vega de Espinareda - 8 Calle de la Conchera
title_short: (24430) Vega de Espinareda - 8 Calle de la Conchera
description: Free parking two minutes from the river beach. Without services Lawn parking next to the town center. Bars and supermarkets.

title: (24430) Vega de Espinareda - 17 Calle el Pascón
title_short: (24430) Vega de Espinareda - 17 Calle el Pascón
description: Side street on the river beach, allowed to park and spend the night outside the summer season, confirmed by the tourist office. Supermarkets, bakery and restaurants in the immediate vicinity.

title: (24435) Valle de Finolledo - Unnamed Road
description: Faucet with good flow and hose connection

title: (24722) Foncebadón - 63 Calle Real
description: We parked one night in this small hamlet located on the Camino de Santiago road. There are a few bars and hostel. This is not an official car park, but we only stayed one night without a problem.

title: (24722) Foncebadón -
description: Parking next to the road with amazing views. Road is not busy.It is suitable for vans and smaller motorhomes (up to 6m). Gets busy during weekend.It is uneven, might need to use wedges, we didn't. We walked Camino from here. Amazing pizza in the village. NB! road ahead is passable for smaller motorhomes and vans only! It's very scenic but narrow, especially going through the village El Acebo.

title: (24722) Foncebadón - Calle Real
description: Next to the house. A very quiet place at the entrance of the city. Without services.

title: (24436) León - 9171 Lugar Valle Finolledo
description: Fluvial beach of the Ancares river. Well-kept grass esplanade with picnic tables, swimming area in the river, small pool for children and a bar. In the parking lot there are only a few level spaces.

title: (32311) Rubiá - Unnamed Road
description: Next to the track that connects both sides of the tunnel. Not more than one car passed all morning. tremendous views. Super quiet place. The track to the south is a bit steeper and has more rocks, but it can be climbed well with some practice. It is shorter, in 4 min you are up. The climb from the south is a bit longer but more tended. Worth it for the canyon views and the solitude from up there. It would fit 2 vans maximum

title: (32329) Vilar de Silva - 29 Lugar Vilardesilva
description: Gazebo with space for two vans. Pretty flat. Next to a very little traveled road Beautiful views with a place to sit and eat.

title: (32329) Vilar de Silva - 15 Lugar Vilardesilva
description: Cement parking with a small incline and a source of drinking water. Slope entry without problem for vans but inadvisable for large volumes. Viewpoints with views of Serra da Encina. Playground and small canteen 50m away where you can eat tapas or food on request. Lovely townspeople, we are very welcome.

title: (24384) Puente de Domingo Flórez - Calle la Laguna
title_short: (24384) Puente de Domingo Flórez - Calle la Laguna
description: Small spot by the river just a garbage can, a lot of current so be careful when swimming! Accessible big size!

title: (24384) Salas de la Ribera -
description: Two very nice places right on the river. Very quiet (apart from the birdsong and frogs croaking). One directly under a high-voltage line (but it doesn't bother you), another 50 m further (easiest to reach via the first one). Without any technical equipment, but both with fireplace and bathing (shallow water).

title: (24384) Puente de Domingo Flórez - Calle la Laguna
title_short: (24384) Puente de Domingo Flórez - Calle la Laguna
description: Fluvial Beach San Antonio. Very quiet place on the banks of the Sil, perfect to spend the night and take a bath. It is further from the highway than Playa Fluvial El Retorno; something that is appreciated. We will be back!

title: (32311) Rubiá - 71 Lugar Biobra
description: Nice town in the middle of nature. There is a spring source where the townspeople collect water. There is also a social center open until quite late right next door.

title: (24370) Torre del Bierzo - 8C Camino Canal
description: New public motorhome area that has just opened. Quiet place to spend a few days, clean bathrooms and very nice swimming pools.

title: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número Dos
title_short: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número Dos
description: Small parking just after the bridge, left, for one to two vans or small motorhomes. Nice stream, unfortunately inaccessible. On the other hand, you can go down to the reach of the old mill. Clear water, just enough to soak your feet!

title: (32311) Biobra - N-120
description: Space for 7 or 8 cc. A table with benches. The N120 passes just below but it's not very annoying. Possibility to visit the typical villages of Biobra and Villard de Silva. No services.

name: Camping De Noceda
title: (24319) Camping De Noceda
description: Nice and spacious place, this campsite was not in the application, I just added it, details need to be confirmed and include a photo, from the town there are several mountain routes, with medicinal sources, waterfalls and a beautiful viewpoint, there are pools , soccer field, bars and restaurants etc ,, About the campsite, many details need to be confirmed, such as number of parking spaces, price (if there is one) and many other things ,,

title: (24420) Fabero - 61 Calle Otero
description: Parking, Julia Well, overnight is allowed, without services. Ideal to visit Cabero and the Leon Ancares.

title: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - 8A Calle Número 8 Folgoso Ribera
title_short: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - 8A Calle Número 8 Folgoso Ribera
description: Esplanade near the cemetery. Quiet place to spend the night, without services. Great place to see the stars, sunset and sunrise. Charming village and full of routes.

title: (24420) Fabero - 30 Calle Corrumbin
description: Very quiet parking area, next to the municipal swimming pool and tennis courts. The town center is a two minute walk away. Area with rivers, hiking trails. In wild nature

title: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número 27 Folgoso Ribera
title_short: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número 27 Folgoso Ribera
description: Tables and barbecues, ample parking and a children's play area. Next to a dam for bathing and from there hiking trails start. A very pretty town.

title: (24722) Rabanal del Camino - 28 Calle Real
description: Very quiet and clean place on the Camino de Santiago. if you dirty something or leave garbage there is a man who passes by every day and you can get a good one, if you are respectful and discreet, without problems to spend the night.

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - 25 LE-142
description: Parking on the grass at the end of the village, on the Camino Frances (French Way). We stayed the night and it was calm, we were two campers

title: (24517) Cadafresnas - 63A Cadafresnas
description: Beautiful place, very quiet, with very beautiful views and in an area with many possibilities for walking, hiking, and very close to the Peña del Seo, an important Wolfram extraction site. Firm and fairly flat ground.

title: (32312) Oulego - OU-622
description: Picnic area at the foot of the Sierra da Encina da Lastra, with slate tables. Very calm. Little space to park.

name: Valle do Seo
title: (24523) Valle do Seo
description: The Valle do Seo campsite is a small but great campsite! With the river pool. Bathrooms, new showers. Laundry Bar and restaurant with very rich food. It also has bungalows and hostel. the staff is very attentive and pleasant. A site of 10!

title: (24312) Boeza - 20 Calle Río Boeza
description: Quiet and pleasant place next to the Boeza River

title: (32312) Rubiá - 2 Lugar Oulego
description: Recreational area within the Serra da Lastra Natural Park, with beautiful views of the Penedos de Olulego, room for two parking spaces, with drinking water and barbecue grills, you can spend the night without problem.

title: (32312) Oulego - 38 Lugar Oulego
description: Oulego square with plenty of parking

title: (24388) Silván - LE-126
description: The reason there isn't a single proposal in this area at park4night might be that the view of the ubiquitous heaps of quarries and mines isn't all that sexy. But here the view is mostly good, you have a wonderful view of the Peña Trevinca. next to the old pass road you are far enough from the new one and are completely level.

title: (24312) Folgoso de la Ribera - CV-127-1
description: Place from the top of the town of Boeza

title: (24524) -
description: Service station that has showers. You have to access the hotel cafeteria and they inform you at the bar.

title: (24369) Villagatón - LE-5304
description: It is a service area of Cepsa. It has an area for motorhomes where you can only empty gray water and fill with water. For black deposits, you can ask in the toilets of the gas station. Very large parking space useful for overnight stays. Next door there is another cheap petrol station.

title: (24369) Villagatón - LE-450
description: Cepsa gas station service area. You cannot discharge black water.

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - 115 LE-142
description: Quiet place to spend the night next to a village with a pharmacy and a bar / restaurant nearby. Next to a shady poplar area for picnics.

title: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 38 CL-631
description: Picnic area with tables, fountain, barbecues. Swings. Panoramic view. Flat pitches shaded or sunny. Unfortunately poorly maintained, but acceptable. Quiet night, morning a little noise from 8:30 due to the trucks of the quarry but very bearable.

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - C. Antonio Perez Crespo
title_short: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - C. Antonio Perez Crespo
description: Quiet place to spend the night just behind a residence for the elderly next to a very large esplanade maragato craft center

title: (24524) Ambasmestas - 9A Lugar Ambasmestas
description: Very quiet and flat place, next to a stream.

title: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 6 Plaza el Valle
title_short: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 6 Plaza el Valle
description:
Parking in the village. It is a little inclined but in the last places it is not noticeable.
In the town there are bars, a bakery, a supermarket... There are garbage containers.
No prohibition signs. I spent a very quiet night.

name: Camping Burbia
title: (24437) Camping Burbia
description: Very wild camping but with a very good attention from the ideal owner to disconnect from everything.

name: Camping La Ruta del Oro
title: (24722) Camping La Ruta del Oro
description: Small and cheap campsite with electricity and water on the campsite. Very good bar and reastaurant attached. The owner is very friendly.

title: (24521) Barjas - LE-5101
description: Place near a road with hardly any traffic. Not very flat, but if you search, you will find.

title: (24520) Vega de Valcarce - 4 Calle Calleja
description: Very quiet parking lot overlooking the city does not match the Google photo. there is a water tap on the left side of the building

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - LE-142
description: In the middle of nature, to the right as you go from Santa Colomba to Astorga, there is a path, you travel about 100 m, of track, (good to go with the van,) that takes you to an esplanade surrounded by trees and with a stream to the side. Quiet place to spend the night

title: (24312) Igüeña - 1 Paseo el Catoute
description: Quiet place next to the Boeza river.

title: (24525) Balboa - LE-4104
description: Superb village to spend the night! With a restaurant where you eat super well.

title: (24525) Balboa - LE-4111
description: Wide and good parking, good views and close to the city center

title: (24525) - 19A Lugar Balboa
description: Quiet area next to the cemetery, full of trees, is a free camping area, the road is a bit hidden, better access down Balboa where you can go around.

title: (24470) Páramo del Sil - 9322 Lugar Diseminado
description: Leisure area with tables already covered. There is no service, but there is fairly flat ground floor parking and it is a quiet and beautiful location next to a river. Ideal for the night.

name: Camping Valle de Ancares
title: (24433) Camping Valle de Ancares
description:
✅ ANCARES VALLEY CAMPING
 
The location is great: it is a green space full of trees that belongs to a UNESCO biosphere reserve and on the banks of the Cuiña river, all within a short walk from the small village of Pereda de Ancares.
If you travel with the intention of spending serene nights of rest, you should book a stay at this mountain campsite in the Sierra de Ancares, as it enjoys a quiet environment conducive to rest and outdoor activities.
The campsite has the Active Tourism company "Ancares Activa" that will offer you the best of adventures!
Less than 1 minute walking we will have the soccer and basketball courts. The months of July and August have a municipal pool!

title: (24375) Igüeña - 6 LE-460
description: Motorhome area Pobladura de las Regueras.

title: (24520) Ruitelán - 40A Carretera Nacional VI
description: Nice place with picnic tables next to a river, it has a fountain with drinking water, a garbage can and a children's area. It is located next to a very quiet road. Space for 6 vans. We spent the night very quiet with hardly any noise.

title: (24740) - 74A Avenida Tomas Sastre
description: Picnic area and recreation area of Trucha. beautiful but tiny, with beautiful stream. There are four wooden tables and two barbecues. No water or trash. Football goals ... nice and quiet city with basic services ... there are no shadows, but in these regions, the sun is welcome! Attention: cow dung everywhere! There is a height limit when entering!

title: (24525) Balboa - LU-723
description: Small space for 2 or 3 vans, with somewhat difficult access to larger vehicles. Right at the turnoff to Valverde.

title: (24717) Luyego de Somoza - Travesía Iglesia
description: Great location in the heart of the Maragatos people. Calm night. Opposite the hotel restaurant, with the possibility of WiFi with a drink.

title: (24526) Vega de Valcarce - 17 CV-125/1
description:
Quiet small parking space by a small stream.
Ideal for a couple of nights stay.
the village has various cafes and restaurants

title: (32300) Viloira - 21 Avenida Sil do Interior
description: Gravel surface, quiet corner of town, shade, close to the river, in between two sports fields. Children’s playground at 50 m. Nearby walking trail to town. As we were there, some youngsters kicking ball on soccer field, no problem though.

title: (32315) Viloira - 15A Rúa Malecón do Campiño
description: Location not great but free services.

title: (32300) O Barco - 16 Calle Castor Pérez Vega
title_short: (32300) O Barco - 16 Calle Castor Pérez Vega
description: Mixed car park in which they have an area for trucks. Very close to the center. Quiet to sleep, although it is close to the road that crosses the town, so the cars can be heard a little. For one night if you are in the area wanting to stop. For us, better than in the sleeping area. Here, without services

title: (32300) O Barco - 3 Rúa a Balorca
description: Laundry room with lots of washers and dryers. Parking next to it quite busy but where you will surely find a place to stop while you wait for your laundry.

title: (24717) Quintanilla de Somoza - C. Arriba
description: Dirt parking very close to the river. It has tables and benches to eat.

title: (32300) O Barco - 3 Rúa Caleras
description: Very quiet place, 5 minutes walk from the center

title: (32300) El Barco de Valdeorras - 28 Avenida Conde de Fenosa
title_short: (32300) El Barco de Valdeorras - 28 Avenida Conde de Fenosa
description: Laundry. There is a very large parking lot opposite where you can leave your caravan.

title: (32300) O Barco - 5 Rúa Orense
description: Parking for all types of vehicles. Very spacious, on battery but with enough space for motorhomes.

title: (24521) Busmayor - 12A Lugar Busmayor
description: Very quiet place, perfect to visit the Busmayor beech forest. In the town square, next to a playground with tables.

title: (32300) O Barco - 2 Parque do Malecón
description: Free public parking. Next to the river, playground and later restaurant area. No noise problem but well lit. It seems like a safe area.

title: (24740) Truchas - Calle Piñedo-Tl
description: Quiet place with benches and tables, next to a very, very little traveled road

title: (24740) Truchas - Calle Piñedo-Tl
description: Picnic area in Truchillas. It has a large level parking lot and three stone tables to eat. In addition, the tables have a small slate roof to produce a small shade.

title: (24740) Truchas - Calle Piñedo-Tl
description: Picnic area with picnic areas and shadows next to the river, in front of the ascent to the lake of trout

title: (24738) Cunas - Calle Padazo
description: Picnic area with barbecues, tables and drinking water fountain.

title: (24717) Val de San Lorenzo - 17 Calle del Caño
title_short: (24717) Val de San Lorenzo - 17 Calle del Caño
description: Quiet square where you can empty the gray in very easy sewers. the baker spends Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays. town without even a bar but walks Pinar y Encinar and other towns nearby.

title: (24429) Peranzanes - LE-4212
description: Parking next to a recreational area on the outskirts of Chano with a bathing area. In the village there is a bar with wifi and nearby are the famous pallozas. Very well-kept and quiet place.

title: (24495) Palacios del Sil - 15 Calle Calvo Sotelo
title_short: (24495) Palacios del Sil - 15 Calle Calvo Sotelo
description: Space and shade at the end of this road, great swimming under the bridge. recreation area across the bridge below. You have to park on the flat

name: Camping La Zarapica
title: (24495) Camping La Zarapica
description: Newly created campsite, a magical place without tourist exploitation, ideal for families and pets.

address.street: Carretera Palacios del Sil - Salientes s/n

title: (24495) Palacios del Sil -
description: It is a place with picnic tables in the middle of the forest. It can be accessed by a dirt road. Not possible for AC, only vans. The dirt road is quite narrow but passable. In June there are a lot of mosquitoes here.

title: (24721) - Calle los Molinos
description: Very nice area to spend the night without services. Next to lake, with nice picnic area. Perfect to rest.

title: (24718) Astorga - LE-142
description:
Big parking close to beautiful stone village Castrillo de los polvazares..
Lots of restaurants to eat the famous Maragato food. There's also a lovely bar with live music.
Aloung the pilgrims road Camino de Santiago

title: (27652) Rao - LE-4211
description: Picnic lookout. Parking for several cars. 1669m.

title: (27670) Pedrafita do Cebreiro - 1 Avenida Castilla
description: Large parking area used by truckers and motorhomes. Public toilets with hot showers. Picnic benches and grassed area. On edge of small town. Bins available. Fresh water by entrance to parking area, and in town itself.

title: (27664) Robledo -
description: Large parking lot with a small level area near the hostel, the rest of the parking lot is uneven. The hostel is abandoned but it has a rest area with tables and grills to spend the day and it is well cared for. We spent the night from Sunday to Monday quiet and alone, and at dawn we were woken up by 3 super nice burritos who were accompanying us during breakfast. a good part of how good the lawn on the site is, I suppose, is thanks to these burritos that serve as natural lawnmowers. super quiet site during the week and start of incredible routes. On the weekend I suppose it will be a little more crowded but still a super recommended place.

title: (24718) Murias de Rechivaldo - Calle Camino Angosto de Los Carboneros
title_short: (24718) Murias de Rechivaldo - Calle Camino Angosto de Los Carboneros
description: Just a small picnic area. Shadow. Benches. Tables. Water. No other service.

address.street: Calle Camino Angosto de Los Carboneros

title: (27671) Pedrafita do Cebreiro - LU-633
description: Parking with beautiful views. Amazing place, beautiful village of pilgrims step. A unique place. Very advisable

title: (27671) Pedrafita do Cebreiro - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with tables (has 13), shaded, swings, side of a quiet road area. 20 or 30 parking spaces.

title: (27671) O Cebreiro - 16 Lugar Cebreiro
description: Suitable for AC or camper of maximum 6 meters.

title: (27671) O Cebreiro - 4D Lugar Cebreiro
description: Lookout / parking

title: (32340) Vilamartín de Valdeorras - 132 Lugar Vilamartin
description: Recreational area entering from the main road. Past the bridge underneath, an area next to the shady river. Perfect for a stopover or whatever arises.

title: (24433) Candín - LE-3203
description: Outside Piornedo wide site on the border between León and Galicia, a short walk from the town and surrounded by nature

title: (24133) Murias de Paredes - 1 Plaza Juan Rubio
title_short: (24133) Murias de Paredes - 1 Plaza Juan Rubio
description: Parking in the Fasgar square, a place for about 6 motorhomes, a quiet place and a good starting point for mountain routes, the forgotten path passes through here. There are no bars open, except in August. In the town festivals (July 25) the square is occupied

title: (32365) Ponte - 13 Lugar Puente
description: At the entrance of the town in front of the church there is a small square where several caravans can spend the night and in the same town there are also several places for camper vans. And also in the same town there are fountains and a river passes where we can wash. There are 4 hiking trails for nature lovers.

title: (27667) - LU-P-1401
description: Unpaved and uneven parking. Ideal to visit Piornedo. 5 min walk from the entrance of the town. We only parked to visit but I don't think it will bother anyone if they stay overnight.

title: (32366) Edreira -
description: Sendero "o rañadoiro" Parking for 1 or 2 next to the untraveled road where it begins a beautiful path to a stellar viewpoint Surrounded by mountains, splendid views Quiet place, only the wind is heard, which hits strongly Recommended

title: (33812) Degaña - Camino de la Fábrica
description: Recreational area secluded from the town of Degaña, with access by narrow road (Not suitable for motorhomes). There are tables and drinking water, and above all there is a covered area for rainy days.

title: (33812) Degaña - 8A Carretera General-Tablado
description: Free sports center parking. Very quiet to spend the night, although the road is close it is not very busy. The squares are not level.

title: (49361) Galende - 26 ZA-122
description: Night impossible in summer. In winter, it is possible to do so, although it is a National Park and in the regulations this is prohibited.

title: (33812) -
description: Picnic area. Perfect route for motorcycle route. "Nearby" San Antolín de ibias and degaña.

title: (33812) Degaña - 14 Carretera General-Tablado
description: Motorhome area under construction, at the time it will have the normal services, for the moment I can spend the night, which is not little. In this town there is everything, what is needed to spend a few days of tranquility and health....

title: (33812) Degaña - 36A Barrio los Castechones
description: Car park in Cerredo next to the Ibias river, a quiet and flat area next to the school and the doctor's office, a pleasant promenade with lampposts and wooden benches with tables. Incredible views of the mountain!!

title: (33812) Degaña - AS-212
description: Parking next to the road, somewhat secluded, the noise does not disturb anything. Beautiful views, several mountain routes start from this place. I do not know if any AC will be able to enter since there is a closure with limited width, ideal vans and camper.
